title: Is there a way to customize password generator parameters?

title: browser window max or min only
content:
All of a sudden, I can only get FF to run as a maximized window - otherwise it is minimized and I can't seem to get it to run with a sizeable window?? I'm on a Windows box and this just all of a sudden started this morning. At a hotel so on a pub network also.

Any ideas how I can get FF window size to act normally again??? Thanks

title: Unable to save a screenshot
content:
I'm unable to save screenshots on Firefox (Windows 11) on certain sites. So far I've just noticed this on amazon.in. Funnily enough, I'm able to take screenshots from some product pages, but there are some where they won't save.

https://www.amazon.in/Logitech-G435-Lightspeed-Bluetooth-Wireless/dp/B09GG24DBM/ref=sr_1_1?crid=NVSW2YGSUHET&keywords=Logitech+G435&nsdOptOutParam=true&qid=1696787415&sprefix=logitech+g435%2Caps%2C411&sr=8-1

https://www.amazon.in/HyperX-Wireless-Gaming-Headset-Headphone/dp/B09QX3VDVD/ref=psdc_1388867031_t2_B081PP4CB6

On both these pages, screenshots weren't saving
creator: tanaynambiar

title: Internal Certs Untrusted and now can't access
content:
I am just PO'd the latest update to windows broke my browser and I can't reach my internal CA sites because now my browser does not trust them. What a bunch of BS! I don't want to hear about time and all this other happy horse crap, that is not the issue the update is the issue. I got on a linux box and I can reach it just fine. My internal ESXI Lab I cannot connect to with the same issue. I did the security exception setting from true to false and that didn't fix. Just upsets me to no end when vendors do crap like this.

This is the error I receive with nothing to accept risk, so I am dead in the water until you fix this. Does the same with VMWare.

we could not verify the certificate: reason = untrusted
creator: shawn30

title: not opening
content: I want to open Sky community but FF just flashes up a blank white page, yet it opens ok in MS edge which I dont use. If i cannot get what I want to open I will have to leave FF.
creator: journeyman4

title: Firefox closes by itself or unresponsive then only opens at Taskbar but not in full screen
content:
When Firefox closes by itself (crashes) or becomes unresponsive and I manually close it via Task Manager afterwards when I click on Firefox Desktop icon or Firefox taskbar icon Firefox opens but only at the Taskbar and not full Desktop screen.

See posted image.

The only fix is by deleting the Profile folder in Mozilla AppData hidden folder and replacing it with a restored copy from a System Backup file or a copy of a previous Mozilla Folder with Profiles Folder in it.

Once I replace the current Firefox Profile folder Firefox starts working normally again and starting full screen on my Windows Desktop.

This has been happening the last couple of Firefox versions and with the latest version installed.

Seems to be some sort of conflict with Windows 11 Pro or possibly a Windows security issue.

Thanks in advance

NOTE: I tried pressing Ctrl or Windows key + Arrow Keys to see if possibly it was hidden by Windows. Sometimes if I press Ctrl or Windows Key + and Arrow key the hidden app would show up. But this happens very rarely.
creator: elstaci

title: updates on MacOS High Sierra
content:
Why does update not update from 115.0.3 to 115.3.1esr when told to update and continues to throw up update notices? What can be done about it?

There an issue with preference panel: security settings. The vertical scroll bar disappears spontaneously to it is hard to scroll down to the memory related control elements.

title: Perdita totale tabelle aperte
content:
Buonasera,

fino a pochi minuti fa, avevo ben oltre 150 tabelle aperte, molte delle quali mi servivano. Per sbaglio, chiudo Firefox, e perdo tutto, nonostante io abbia sempre selezionato di riaprire la sessione precedente. Cosa faccio? Non potrò mica riaprire tutto selezionando una per una le tabelle nella mia cronologia. Spero ci sia una soluzione più facile. Vi ringrazio per l'attenzione ma ringrazio soprattutto Mozilla per la grandissima gestione delle sessioni, così eccellente che si dimentica tutto nel giro di pochi secondi.

title: Farmville 2 doesn't launch anymore after latest release of Firefox?
content: Using Mac Catalina, 10.15.7, Looks as if your latest release of Firefox does not allow Farmville 2 to launch. Is there some setting that changed, or is it just Zynga? content: I recently logged out of Firefox and cannot log back in because the process requires an authenticator app, which I have no clue which would work. I have MS Authenticator and Google Authenticator but neither of them bring up any codes sent from Firefox. What on earth can I do? Delete my account and then create a new account with that same email again? However, I can't do that, because I can't login! I'm presently login with another email address, which is how I am posting on this forum. Thanks for your help.

title: firefox 118.0.1 : instabilità e corruzione profilo e continuo downgrade alla  v 117
content:
buongiorno

dal 29 settembre , con l'upgrade alla versione 118.0.1 su OS win11 x64 , sto riscontrando corruzioni frequenti del profilo durante le sessioni di lavoro ( all'apertura di nuove schede o ricerche ) che mi costringe a creare un nuovo profilo ( lo indica FF ) con downgrade alla versione 117 ( che non capisco ) Non sono presenti "crash report". Succede anche senza "sync" dei dati dal mio profilo in cloud e/o import e con impostazioni di default del browser e con e senza estensioni (cookie manager e lasspass ) . Scansione AV non ha dato esiti. Sono passato al "beta" per vedere se con la versione 119 si presenta il problema ; poi proverò in "Troubleshoot Mode"

suggerimenti / indicazioni sono graditi grazie saluti MM
creator: massimo.maringoni

What's the about:config parameter for this? Thanks

title: En la versión 118 ha dejado de mostrar tipografía seleccionada en configuración
content: Buenas: Llevo años con la configuración de una fuente forzosa para todas las páginas, todas las páginas se mostraban con la tipografía que había elegido. Al actualizar a la versión 118, en los dos ordenadores que tengo, ha dejado de funcionar y todo se muestra en arial. He revisado la configuración y sigue como estaba antes (de hecho cuando me pasó en el primero comparé con el segundo, que no estaba actualizado y la configuración era la misma). ¿Alguna pista? Sistema operativo Ubuntu 20.04 LTS.

creator: flaganan

title: Gamepad api doesn't work in firefox but it does in chrome
content: I am using the web api for videogame controllers to make a web remote controller for a robot, i use django to host the server. When i access the ip of the Django server in firefox i get errors like: getGamepads is not a function or errors while trying to get gamepads from the navigator, but when i access through chrome this does not happen. These errors only happen while accessing through the django server, when i access through the local file or other pages in the web that use gamepad api there is no issue. Because of that i think that it has something to do with firefox tight security restrictions on http sites, but i can't find a way to grant permission to my page to work properly, i am willing to compromise in security since it's just going to be used locally
creator: bendca61

title: I need "Never Ask Agian" to update password when i login in website by "Saved user-name and password"
content: Every time i login in website by "Saved user-name and password"，the Explorer will advise me to update saved password.Once i click "UPDATE",my saved password will be override by Random Strong Password and makes me can not login in next time. no matter how i click"update"or"not",the advise will show every time when i login in websites. ps: "Suggest and generate strong passwords" in setting is not chioced.
